'''''"Reji"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Duelist: Series III]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Tatankasaurus Warrior: Spiritlight Chaser|text=Reji &mdash; Launch  and Leap}} while always being protected by a shield whenever Reji lands an attack, and without the shield being destroyed by Reji.
